channel.title: Marcin's Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Marcin's Tech Blog

item.title: Cookies in Chrome and Safari
item.description: You probably heard about Facebook - Cambridge Analytica scandal. You must heard about GDPR in EU. And there are probably more. Privacy and security on the web becomes a big deal to many consumers, so IT giants like Apple or Google takes their effort by introducing privacy and security measures in their browsers by limiting the usage of cookies.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, I’m Marcin. This is my personal blog where I’m going to share article excerpts, summaries & my thinking around many technology related things that I’m looking at on a daily basis.
